base.title: NOVÁ HORA | Zaječí Winery
base.description: Discover delicious Moravian wines! Interesting varieties, precise processing, and unforgettable taste experience. Don't hesitate to contact us and let us introduce you to a piece of Moravian winemaking passion.

footer.cookies: This website uses cookies to ensure optimal user experience and measure its performance. If you continue to use this website, we assume that you agree to the use of cookies. However, you can change your cookie settings at any time through your browser's relevant features.

intro.title: Zaječí Winery Nová Hora
intro.subtitle: Discover delicious Moravian wines with us. Local varieties, traditional processing, unforgettable aroma, and taste. Don't hesitate to contact us and let us share our passion for wine growing and production with you.

about.title: Why Our Wine?
about.subtitle: Traditional wines born in South Moravia.
about.description: Passion for wine and enthusiasm for the beauty of South Moravian landscape and nature led us to Zaječí. Over time, we exchanged office and clinic work for work in the vineyard and cellar. We pass on this passion, enthusiasm, wonder, and beauty, exhaustion from work, and refreshment after it in our wines.

info.history: Moravian and Czech wines are gaining increasing popularity not only here but also worldwide. In the Czech Republic, over 50 varieties are grown, thanks to the diversity and ruggedness of the terrain. Each region contributes specific characteristics to individual varieties, so everyone can choose the best wine for themselves. Explore quality wines from Moravia and Bohemia and discover the beauty through a wine glass.
info.history2: The typical character of the wines is similar to Tramín Red variety wines, but the spicy fullness is usually lower, and on the contrary, the acidity is somewhat higher. However, it is necessary to maintain acidity for a pleasant finish. Wines are usually golden-yellow in color, with Tramín aromatic substances in the aroma, namely roses, complemented by vanilla tones; the taste is full, long-lasting, with a gentler harmony than Tramín. In aroma and taste, we can find spices, nutmeg, vanilla, tangerines.

premium.title: All you can drink
premium.drink: Tasting of all samples (min. 9 white, 4 rosé, 4 red)
premium.food: Rich refreshments, water, non-alcoholic drinks, beer, cider, šláftruňk
premium.time: Duration according to mood, approx. 5 hours
